code: import React,{useState}from"react";import Draggable from"react-draggable";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Text=()=>{const[editMode,setEditMode]=useState(false);const[val,setVal]=useState("Double Click to Edit");return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Draggable,{children:editMode?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onDoubleClick:e=>setEditMode(false),value:val,onChange:e=>setVal(e.target.value)}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{onDoubleClick:e=>setEditMode(true),children:val})});};export default Text;
